description:
Become a **Badger** and collect **AYA nature Badges**. Badgers have a greater chance of winning FREE NFTs, HUGE discounts & Early access!

Some Badges have assignments, some are only available for 1 day.

This 1 you can collect without having to do anything, except hit Participate.

Badgers will get access to our SOON to be released NFT collection of.. Badger Coins! Sneak preview will come #SOON on our Twitter.

May the Badger in you be awakened!!!

Infinite Love,
AYA nature!
name: Help nature by winning **Gold Nature Coin** NFTs!
